todos.content: Investigate model selection bug - status bar shows claude-opus-4-6 but agent uses GLM-4.7
Trace the set_model flow: frontend -> ws -> backend -> runner -> pi
Fix: revert optimistic model updates on failure in useModelSelection, ChatView, ChatSettingsView
Fix: only persist model to localStorage/server after confirmed agentSetModel success
Clean up dead code in status-bar.tsx (unused localStorage polling, shortenModelRef, imports)
